description.value: A rogue with this talent can attempt a Fly check against a target’s CMD as a swift action when charging from above that target. Success allows the rogue to add an amount damage equal to her Dexterity modifier to the attack’s damage. This additional damage is precision damage and is not multiplied on a critical hit. A creature immune to sneak attacks is immune to this additional damage. A rogue must be trained in Fly to select this talent.
